isis.stitle: TSI 04-12-16 - High-Pressure Pump Repair Kit For Fitting Leakage Repair

subjectgroup.subject: High-Pressure Pump Repair Kit For Fitting Leakage Repair

geninfo.para: This TSI applies to all I6 electronic injection controlled engines with high-pressure oil pumps, serial number range 933364 and above (excluding the 2,000,000 serial number series). Engines equipped with an Exhaust Gas Recirculating (EGR) valve, a 2004 MY emissions label, and a serial number that starts with 2,000,000 and above are excluded from use of this service kit.

This TSI is to announce that the high-pressure oil pump service kit and instruction sheet have been updated, kit part number 1842906C92. Changes are longer plugs and fitting threads that are required for increased torque to prevent leaks. The 1/4 inch ferry plug check ball is now a serviceable part but is not included in the kit.

Also included in the kit instructions is a new procedure requiring a heat gun to apply heat to the high-pressure pump housing bosses for removal of the outlet fitting and construction and oil ferry plugs.

The 1/4 inch ferry plug check ball is now a serviceable part but is not included in the kit. The part number for the 1/4 inch ferry plug check ball is 1833830C1.

caution.para: If the hex on the outlet fitting has notches as shown in Figure 1 of the high-pressure oil pump to be repaired, do not attempt further repair of the pump. Replacement of the pump is advised.

geninfo.para: Notches on the outlet fitting are for service only. This provides the ability to identify a pump that has had a kit previously installed.
Figure 2 shows the boss locations of the two plugs and outlet fitting to apply heat. This aids removal of the plugs and fitting without damage to aluminum-housing threads.
